revised_title: Economic Broadband Systems and Technological Advancements in Telecommunications
tldr: This article discusses the advancements in telecommunications technology during the 1980s, focusing on the development of economic broadband systems. The author highlights the importance of electronic components, optical fiber carrier transmission, and large scale integration in reducing costs and improving the efficiency of telecommunications systems. The article also emphasizes the need for continued investment in research and development to maintain a competitive edge in the global market.
